list_definition.definition: a short, thin, pointed piece of metal used eg to hold pieces of fabric, paper etc together, especially when making clothes

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The papers are fastened together by a pin.

list_definition.definition: a similar but more ornamental object
to hold by pressing against something

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The fallen tree pinned him to the ground.

list_definition.definition: short for personal identification number; a number that you must use to get money from a cash machine using a special plastic card.
